overview: The 2014 Nepalese film Kohinoor follows the story of a man who accidentally sells a girl in the Indian market. due to a misunderstanding, he ends up selling a girl named Kohinoor to human traffickers. Saddened and feeling guilty, Siddharth embarks on a perilous journey to save Kohinoor from the clutches of the traffickers.  As he navigates through the treacherous world of human trafficking, he faces several challenges and risks his own life to rescue Kohinoor. As they journey together, Siddharth falls in love with Kohinoor, and their love story develops amidst the chaos of their situation.
title: Kohinoor
